original_text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.
korean_text: 그러므로 사람이 부모를 떠나 그의 아내와 합하여 그 둘이 한 육체가 될지니

sentences.original_text: shall a man leave his father and mother
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 그 아버지와 어머니를 떠날 것이요

sentences.original_text: and shall be joined unto his wife
and they two shall be one flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘이 한 몸이 될 것이라
